p: The cycling of PCR conditions was 94 °C for 3 min, 30 cycles of 94 °C for 0.5 min, 55 °C for 0.5 min, 72 °C for 1 min, and a final extension performed at 72 °C for 10 min. The PCR products were forward- and reverse-sequenced using the Applied Biosystem’s 3730xl DNA Analyzer technology at Sigma company, Cairo, Egypt.
